Text:
"May the 4th ..."  Groan, bad pun there!  You just couldn't resist, could you?  ;-)

Grazie for the ul!

Today is May 4th. Also called 'May the Fourth'.
You lose your nerd license if you don't say this all day to everyone you meet. :)

Nooooooo it's not my bad pun! That's what Dark Horse called this. I promise!

They actually have a sale going on today for a butt-load of digital SW comics (and I think they're All Ages comics), and this was packaged in the bundles.

and yeah xenoFLASH, my wife told me about this earlier. she kept saying May the Fourth is Star Wars day. i said no it's FCBD. she said "huh?"  :-)

also, $4 margaritas at the restaurant tonight for Cinco De Mayo weekend!
sounds interesting...who am I kidding? if it's got Star Wars in the title I'm reading it. Thank for the upload.
May the 4th is actually a pretty common star wars thing. I'm surprised people didn't know about it.

i loved star wars in the 80s and 90s but the expanded universe is so... well, expanded that i can't keep track of most of it.  :-)

the wikipedia page for star wars day says this may the 4th thing really caught fire in 2011. so 3 years...
